alert.note: Alert for Broadwater; Meagher (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Watch issued June 20 at 3:10AM MDT until June 21 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WATCH FOR THE DEEP CREEK AND WOODS CREEK BURN SCARS IN EFFECT THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flash flooding and debris flows caused by excessive rainfall are possible over the Deep Creek and Woods Creek burn scars. * WHERE...Portions of central and southwest Montana, including the following counties, in central Montana, Meagher. In southwest Montana, Broadwater. * WHEN...Through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Heavy rainfall over the Deep Creek and Woods Creek burn scars is expected up to and during the period of the watch. Residents near the Deep Creek and Woods Creek burn scars should prepare for potential flooding impacts. Be sure to stay up to date with information from local authorities. Heavy rainfall could trigger flash flooding of low-lying areas, urbanized street flooding, and debris flows in and near recent wildfire burn scars. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - National Weather Service Meteorologists are forecasting heavy rainfall over the burn scar, which may lead to flash flooding and debris flows. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
